texts.name: Riera the Baroness
texts.biography: Someone said Riera looks like the Countess in tale, but she is really a kind woman and often helps the poverty. Maybe such view only because her husband Baron Von Schiffer was dead in the disaster and became a vampire by necromancers.

specialty.description: Casts Weakness with effect increased by 3 for level 1–2 creatures, by 2 for level 3–4 creatures, and by 1 for level 5–6 creatures.
specialty.name: Weakness
